changelog:
No JSON update required.
- Hawke's Bay: Suspects no longer spawn outside of map in showdown
- Passenger Train: Update for new mod release, enables 4 more targets
- Mendoza Day: Yates bodyguards gone, 2 stationary targets removed, 6 targets from Heartbreaker added
- Santa Fortuna Night: Moves Supplier to non-trespassing area
- The Disruptor: Removes Bell Ringer as target, adds 3 targets to make up for it
